20110118130041.000|20110118130044.000|TR0|the violent protest that forced it into 
20110118130044.000|20110118130046.000|TR0|existence are not over.  Now, 
20110118130046.000|20110118130048.000|TR0|demonstrators are fighting the continued 
20110118130048.000|20110118130050.000|TR0|presence of old regime members in the new 
20110118130050.000|20110118130053.000|TR0|cabinet.  Now, that cabinet contains 
20110118130053.000|20110118130055.000|TR0|opposition leaders, but it`s headed by 
20110118130055.000|20110118130057.000|TR0|this man, Prime Minister Mohamed 
20110118130057.000|20110118130100.000|TR0|Ghannouchi.
20110118130100.000|20110118130102.000|TR0|
20110118130102.000|20110118130104.000|TR0|Now, he took the reins after the departure 
20110118130104.000|20110118130107.000|TR0|of longtime president Ben Ali last week.  
20110118130107.000|20110118130109.000|TR0|The so-called "unity government" has not 
20110118130109.000|20110118130111.000|TR0|brought unity on Tunisia`s streets.  And 
20110118130111.000|20110118130114.000|TR0|U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon has 
20110118130114.000|20110118130116.000|TR0|called for a return to stability, but 
20110118130116.000|20110118130118.000|TR0|stability seems a long way off.  And that 
20110118130118.000|20110118130121.000|TR0|could impede the new government in its 
20110118130121.000|20110118130123.000|TR0|ultimate goal, leading Tunisia toward new 
20110118130123.000|20110118130125.000|TR0|elections.

20110118130146.000|20110118130148.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Yes, Kristie.  Let me just 
20110118130148.000|20110118130151.000|TR0|explain to you why I`m here, because down 
20110118130151.000|20110118130153.000|TR0|there, on Habib Bourghiba (ph) Avenue, 
20110118130153.000|20110118130155.000|TR0|it`s been about three hours of a running 
20110118130155.000|20110118130158.000|TR0|battle between these protesters and the 
20110118130158.000|20110118130200.000|TR0|police.
20110118130200.000|20110118130202.000|TR0|
20110118130202.000|20110118130205.000|TR0|The protesters are calling for this 
20110118130205.000|20110118130207.000|TR0|current unity government that was formed 
20110118130207.000|20110118130209.000|TR0|just yesterday to go.  They want everybody 
20110118130209.000|20110118130212.000|TR0|with any association with the former 
20110118130212.000|20110118130214.000|TR0|regime to be fired, to be out, to have no 
20110118130214.000|20110118130216.000|TR0|power.  And, of course, that includes the 
20110118130216.000|20110118130218.000|TR0|prime minister, Mohamed Ghannouchi, the 
20110118130218.000|20110118130221.000|TR0|interim president, the foreign minister, 
20110118130221.000|20110118130223.000|TR0|and the interior minister.
20110118130223.000|20110118130225.000|TR0|
20110118130225.000|20110118130228.000|TR0|And already, we`ve heard that several 
20110118130228.000|20110118130230.000|TR0|ministers have quit.  One minister is 
20110118130230.000|20110118130232.000|TR0|saying that they`re not going to join the 
20110118130232.000|20110118130235.000|TR0|government since they actually hadn`t 
20110118130235.000|20110118130237.000|TR0|accepted the post in the first place.
20110118130237.000|20110118130239.000|TR0|
20110118130239.000|20110118130242.000|TR0|So what happened to us is we were right in 
20110118130242.000|20110118130244.000|TR0|the middle of that demonstration, which is 
20110118130244.000|20110118130246.000|TR0|now -- basically, what happens is a couple 
20110118130246.000|20110118130249.000|TR0|hundred people will congregate, and then 
20110118130249.000|20110118130251.000|TR0|what they`re trying to do is reach the 
20110118130251.000|20110118130253.000|TR0|ruling party headquarters, which they want 
20110118130253.000|20110118130256.000|TR0|to, they say, peacefully occupy.  The 
20110118130256.000|20110118130258.000|TR0|police will then rush in, firing tear gas 
20110118130258.000|20110118130300.000|TR0|all over the place, oftentimes at very 
20110118130300.000|20110118130302.000|TR0|close range.
20110118130302.000|20110118130305.000|TR0|
20110118130305.000|20110118130307.000|TR0|In fact, I was caught in a back alley with 
20110118130307.000|20110118130309.000|TR0|about 30 other people, a very tight alley. 
20110118130309.000|20110118130312.000|TR0| And they fired a tear gas canister right 
20110118130312.000|20110118130314.000|TR0|inside, and this is really strong stuff.  
20110118130314.000|20110118130316.000|TR0|This is tear gas that really just makes 
20110118130316.000|20110118130319.000|TR0|you -- you have to stop whatever you`re 
20110118130319.000|20110118130321.000|TR0|doing.  You cough, you hack, your nose and 
20110118130321.000|20110118130323.000|TR0|your eyes are running.  And it`s been like 
20110118130323.000|20110118130326.000|TR0|that now for three hours.
20110118130326.000|20110118130328.000|TR0|
20110118130328.000|20110118130330.000|TR0|Now, I did hear from eyewitness, because 
20110118130330.000|20110118130333.000|TR0|we`re not there right now -- we`re here -- 
20110118130333.000|20110118130335.000|TR0|that, in fact, just a little while ago, 
20110118130335.000|20110118130337.000|TR0|the army stopped the police from pursuing 
20110118130337.000|20110118130340.000|TR0|protesters.  People credit the army with 
20110118130340.000|20110118130342.000|TR0|actually having stood down, and that was 
20110118130342.000|20110118130344.000|TR0|why Ben Ali, the former president of 
20110118130344.000|20110118130346.000|TR0|Tunisia, left the country.  So there`s a 
20110118130346.000|20110118130349.000|TR0|lot of hatred for the police, but a lot of 
20110118130349.000|20110118130351.000|TR0|admiration and respect for the army -- 
20110118130351.000|20110118130353.000|TR0|Kristie.

20110118130433.000|20110118130435.000|TR0|was sort of window-dressing opposition,

20110118130554.000|20110118130556.000|TR0|Tunisians say to be (ph) reported that 
20110118130556.000|20110118130558.000|TR0|they were what appeared mercenaries bent 
20110118130558.000|20110118130601.000|TR0|on creating chaos out of disorder in the 
20110118130601.000|20110118130603.000|TR0|country.  It showed them being beaten by a 
20110118130603.000|20110118130605.000|TR0|mob and security forces, and in possession 
20110118130605.000|20110118130608.000|TR0|of assault guns and ammunition cartridges.
20110118130608.000|20110118130610.000|TR0|

20110118130612.000|20110118130615.000|TR0|men several hours later here in this hotel 
20110118130615.000|20110118130617.000|TR0|where we`re staying.  After spending hours 
20110118130617.000|20110118130619.000|TR0|in army custody, they were staggering,

20110118130635.000|20110118130638.000|TR0|baton blows were evident under examination.

20110118130642.000|20110118130645.000|TR0|broken, most likely.

20110118130654.000|20110118130656.000|TR0|and brothers from the Uppsala area of 
20110118130656.000|20110118130659.000|TR0|Sweden -- a farmer, a fireman, a

20110118130708.000|20110118130710.000|TR0|tourists getting here for holiday in one 
20110118130710.000|20110118130713.000|TR0|week to hunt wild pigs in the forest in

20110118130719.000|20110118130722.000|TR0|we were -- the taxi driver tried to take 
20110118130722.000|20110118130724.000|TR0|us to a hotel.
20110118130724.000|20110118130726.000|TR0|

20110118130911.000|20110118130913.000|TR0|STOUT:  And turning now to a deadly attack 
20110118130913.000|20110118130915.000|TR0|in Iraq.  At least 60 people were killed, 
20110118130915.000|20110118130918.000|TR0|scores more wounded, after a suicide 
20110118130918.000|20110118130920.000|TR0|bomber struck at a police recruitment 
20110118130920.000|20110118130922.000|TR0|center.
20110118130922.000|20110118130925.000|TR0|
20110118130925.000|20110118130927.000|TR0|Our Jomana Karadsheh is in Baghdad, about 
20110118130927.000|20110118130929.000|TR0|160 kilometers from the city of Tikrit, 
20110118130929.000|20110118130931.000|TR0|where the bomber struck.  She joins us now 
20110118130931.000|20110118130934.000|TR0|-- Jomana.
20110118130934.000|20110118130936.000|TR0|
20110118130936.000|20110118130938.000|TR0|JOMANA KARADSHEH, CNN INTERNATIONAL 
20110118130938.000|20110118130941.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Hi, Kristie.
20110118130941.000|20110118130943.000|TR0|
20110118130943.000|20110118130945.000|TR0|As you mentioned, according to an Interior 
20110118130945.000|20110118130948.000|TR0|Ministry official, at least 60 people were 
20110118130948.000|20110118130950.000|TR0|killed and more than 150 others wounded.  
20110118130950.000|20110118130952.000|TR0|As we understand from security officials 
20110118130952.000|20110118130955.000|TR0|in the city of Tikrit, at about 8:00 a.m. 
20110118130955.000|20110118130957.000|TR0|local time today, hundreds, about 300 
20110118130957.000|20110118130959.000|TR0|would-be recruits, had lined up outside 
20110118130959.000|20110118131002.000|TR0|this police station waiting to apply for 
20110118131002.000|20110118131004.000|TR0|jobs with the security forces when a 
20110118131004.000|20110118131006.000|TR0|suicide bomber got amongst the crowds and 
20110118131006.000|20110118131009.000|TR0|detonated his vest.
20110118131009.000|20110118131011.000|TR0|
20110118131011.000|20110118131013.000|TR0|And it was a total scene of carnage.  And 
20110118131013.000|20110118131015.000|TR0|what we saw at the hospital there in 
20110118131015.000|20110118131018.000|TR0|Tikrit from pictures we got there, it`s a 
20110118131018.000|20110118131020.000|TR0|scene of chaos, people just in shock and 
20110118131020.000|20110118131022.000|TR0|totally dazed.  And it`s mostly these 
20110118131022.000|20110118131025.000|TR0|young men who had come to apply for jobs 
20110118131025.000|20110118131027.000|TR0|with the security forces.
20110118131027.000|20110118131029.000|TR0|
20110118131029.000|20110118131032.000|TR0|The hospital there, General Hospital in 
20110118131032.000|20110118131034.000|TR0|Tikrit, was so overwhelmed with the number 
20110118131034.000|20110118131036.000|TR0|of victims they received, they had to 
20110118131036.000|20110118131039.000|TR0|transfer some to hospitals in other 
20110118131039.000|20110118131041.000|TR0|cities.  We`re also being told that 
20110118131041.000|20110118131043.000|TR0|mosques in Tikrit were calling on people

20110118131046.000|20110118131048.000|TR0|
20110118131048.000|20110118131050.000|TR0|This is definitely the deadliest attack,

20110118131053.000|20110118131055.000|TR0|While a number of -- the overall levels of

20110118132050.000|20110118132052.000|TR0|might be able to take against Duvalier, up 
20110118132052.000|20110118132055.000|TR0|and to, including arrests, although very 
20110118132055.000|20110118132057.000|TR0|few people here are using that word.  I 
20110118132057.000|20110118132059.000|TR0|think there`s a little bit of concern 
20110118132059.000|20110118132101.000|TR0|about trying to bring this man in and 
20110118132101.000|20110118132104.000|TR0|actually arrest him.  So it`s really 
20110118132104.000|20110118132106.000|TR0|questionable right now, what exactly is

20110118132115.000|20110118132118.000|TR0|

20110118132346.000|20110118132348.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT (voice-over):  It`s the 
20110118132348.000|20110118132351.000|TR0|largest producer of cocaine in the world 
20110118132351.000|20110118132353.000|TR0|and a key supplier of heroin to the United 
20110118132353.000|20110118132355.000|TR0|States.  According to the CIA, Colombia 
20110118132355.000|20110118132357.000|TR0|produces more than 500 metric tons of 
20110118132357.000|20110118132400.000|TR0|cocaine a year, most of it for the U.S. 
20110118132400.000|20110118132402.000|TR0|market.

20110118132407.000|20110118132409.000|TR0|of defense and one of the architects of 
20110118132409.000|20110118132411.000|TR0|Plan Colombia.  Ramirez says the $7

20110118132414.000|20110118132416.000|TR0|narco-terrorism in the last 10 years, but 
20110118132416.000|20110118132418.000|TR0|the high drug demand in the U.S. makes it

20110118135317.000|20110118135320.000|TR0|for, scientists at the University of 
20110118135320.000|20110118135322.000|TR0|Queensland in Australia say time travel 
20110118135322.000|20110118135324.000|TR0|may well exist.  It`s all to do with a 
20110118135324.000|20110118135326.000|TR0|strange quantum phenomenon called 
20110118135326.000|20110118135329.000|TR0|entanglement that I`m going to try to

20110118135331.000|20110118135333.000|TR0|

20110118135336.000|20110118135338.000|TR0| Now these two particles can become so 
20110118135338.000|20110118135340.000|TR0|deeply linked that if you change the state 
20110118135340.000|20110118135343.000|TR0|of this one, the other one will 
20110118135343.000|20110118135345.000|TR0|immediately change in exactly the same way

20110118135347.000|20110118135350.000|TR0|it`s lead some to call it a form of 
20110118135350.000|20110118135352.000|TR0|teleportation.  Now what scientists in 
20110118135352.000|20110118135354.000|TR0|Australia discovered was that this effect
